TextToVoice.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tts.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: TextToVoice
<common request parameters>

{
    "Text": "你好",
    "SessionId": "session-1234",
    "Volume": 1,
    "Speed": 1,
    "ProjectId": 0,
    "ModelType": 1,
    "VoiceType": 1001,
    "PrimaryLanguage": 1,
    "SampleRate": 16000,
    "Codec": "wav",
    "EnableSubtitle": true
}
TextToVoice.title: 基础语音合成调用示例
